attributes.action: Tell us all why we dont want an early general election and if no good reason is given then have an early general election!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taken from the bbc news website earlier today... 'Mr Cameron is also calling for an immediate general election to give the public an opportunity to get rid of MPs who have been caught up in the scandal.... But Mr Brown ruled out an early poll, saying: "I think what people want is to clean up the system first."', What I would like to know is why mr Brown seems to think the people dont want an early poll, can he mindread? I would like mr Brown to state on tv why he thinks the nation wouldnt want an early poll and if he cannot give a satisfactory reason and back that up with a solid set of figures backing up his claims an early poll should be called...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
